user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Olive', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: Honestly this is the best product I have used, the bomb itself applies very light and goes darker with multiple applies. Without that shiny gloss look!

user_specs: ['Eye Color Green', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_content:
At this price point ur mainly paying for the brand name but Wow I love this product it’s amazing on my lips. The packaging is so so beautiful, mirror like and heavy just like I expect in a lux house. The gold flakes look stunning. My lips are moisturized a slight color change too very light pink on my lips to match my natural lip color but just enhanced. Not to much color the way I like. So for me this definitely worth it and worth 5 stars. Will definitely be buying backup just incense this is limited. You can buy similar lip balms for a fraction of the price. But I love my lux! Very happy.

review_content: It is an amazing product. I received it as a gift, and it is simply so beautiful.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Deep', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: Beautiful packaging, ordinary product. There is nothing special about this. It is inferior to most of the lip products sold at Sephora. Laneige is 100x better. But, the container is pretty. That’s why I gave this 2 stars.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Tan', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_title: Easy lux flushed lip. Beautiful packaging
review_content: Is this a new and innovative product? No. Can you buy this type of lip blush elsewhere for a quarter of the price? Yes. But this is Tom Ford. Beautiful packaging. Lux. Can be easily applied without a mirror. Nice to use with some moisturizing qualities. Flush lips. Will I repurchase? Most likely.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Porcelain', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: Purchase this in a tom ford set via Nordstrom. I seriously love the pink color it turns into on my lips. It's moisturizing, a none-sticky texture. I hope they keep this around!!! I will be back for more!

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content:
Enhances the natural pink color of my lips, like how they look after eating a spicy meal. The lip balm is slightly greasy but moisturizing and has no scent or taste. The moisturizing aspect isn’t long-lasting but it does leaves a subtle stain once it wears off. The product very smoothly swipes onto the lips with no tugging and I don’t unscrew it all the way to the top, so I haven’t experienced any breakage. The packaging is beautiful and sturdy. I attached some photos of the swatch alone and on the right side of my lips (left side of photo). This color-changing lip balm works as intended.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content: I love this! I’m always in the quest for lip(care/treatment) product with hint of color. This gives me a healthy pinkish lip flesh color and glides very smooth on lips. Package is always a plus(it’s Tom Ford)!

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Olive', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: I love this!!!! thanks Tom Ford my lips are always dry, until i put this on!!! you can feel the difference immediately, please keep making this.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content:
It’s hilarious that TF even makes this type of lip balm. Back in Asia when I was little, similar products were being sold for a couple bucks each, and honestly no one buys them anymore lol for some strange reason, it became a hype years later over here? Lol The material itself may look cute but it’s seriously cheap, and I doubt that it has any benefits to your lips. I’ve tried this on in Holts when it first came out, and nope, you can barely notice the gold glitter in there LOL why anyone would spend $70 on this is beyond me.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Green', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Normal']

review_content: I love this!! It’s the perfect amount of glossy and the pink stain is very subtle (what I was after). 100% would recommend.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content: I recently purchased First Time (a MUST HAVE for anyone wanting to try Tom Ford products) and fell in love with the creamy formula, seriously addicting lol. I purchased this lip blush in hopes that I could use on my no-makeup makeup days and IT DID NOT DISAPPOINT ♥️ Creamy and lustrous, adds a sheer pink tint. Would def recommend.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Green', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: Most useful lipstick I ever bought. Gorgeous packaging as expected from Tom Ford. Just enough moisture without being sticky. Adds a very light, natural pink hue to the lips for a refreshed look. Perfect for when you’re too lazy to bother with makeup, but still want to look fresh and awake.
I live for this I love this so muchhhhhh!!! It’s my holy grail! So cheap!!! I recommend to a lot of people!!! It’s my 3rd one would buy again!!!

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_content: Well this is a perfectly great “your lip but better” lipstick, it’s very comfortable to wear and it lasts a long time. The packaging feels lux too. “BUT YOU CAN GET IT FOR TWO DOLLARS” Yes all luxury make up (even skincare) takes 50 cents to couple bucks to make. SO?

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: I like it very much. Brings out a really nice pink magically after applying. Quite moisturizing and easy to apply. I might get another one as a spare. Wish it was cheaper though.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content: Light moisturizing lip balm. I like this product and the color it stains my lips. Light red tint, very natural. I would buy it again.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: I drove 1 hour to check the actual product at the store today. I am big fan of Tom Ford eye palettes. I don’t mind to pay $88 for them but not for this one. Unfortunately I couldn’t find anything good with it. It doesn’t stain colors at all on my lips, not moisturizing too. Just transparent stick with some small gold fragments.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Deep', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_content: This product is pretty and that’s about it! It was not moisturizing on my lips and it didn’t add any tint to my lips. It just felt like chicken grease on my lips. This product isn’t even worth half of the price and I’m a Tom Ford fan. The flecks of gold also wasn’t as much as they advertise. This is going straight back to Sephora ASAP!

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Olive', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_content: This product has a lip balm like consistency and turns a very pretty pink colour on my lips. The packaging is matte gold square tube which looks great on my vanity. Caution in applying the product though, as it is quite soft and will break if unscrewed all the way up during application.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_title: SAVE your cash!!! Not TOM FORD Quality at all!!!
review_content:
REALLY!? What's happening with the Tom Ford Brand INWHICH WE ALL LOVE??? This product was first introduced from a Korean Brand which Also had a Clear Gel Lip Color which would Turn Pink Also. However, Remember how in the Korean Brand there was a Dry Flower!!! I Don't Understand Why Tom Ford would Sell Something SO CHEAPLY MADE!!!(While STILL CHARGING A HEFTY PRICE FOR IT!!!) This Product is Honestly TACKY!!! (And I Mean Tacky as in Cheap and Dollar Store Find!!!) Not TOM FORD AT ALL!!! But as for the actual Product, the Gel does glide on but will fade Completely OFF after you lick your lips, or sip on a drink!!! I WONT Even consider this as a lip Balm!! Or Even a Topper for Extra Shine, because Its Gone within Seconds unfortunately!!! Prettier in person though. The photo Does Not do it Justice. However, Save Your Cash for a Real Tom Ford Product!!! I can understand the fact that they wanted a tie on sale for the Gold Body Shimmer. But this wasn't the way to go Tom!!!
